original_text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard, lest at any time we should let them slip.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리는 들은 것에 더욱 유념함으로 우리가 흘러 떠내려가지 않도록 함이 마땅하니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 더욱 간절히 주의를 기울여야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to the things which we have heard
lest at any time we should let them slip
sentences.korean_translation: 언제든지 그것들을 놓쳐서는 안 되기 때문입니다
